thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan, Alia Bhatt's deleted scenes from 'Dear Zindagi' released online! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Shah Rukh Khan, Alia Bhatt's deleted scenes from 'Dear Zindagi' released online! | Zee News

title: Shah Rukh Khan, Alia Bhatt's deleted scenes from 'Dear Zindagi' released online! | Zee News
text:
Shah Rukh Khan, Alia Bhatt's deleted scenes from 'Dear Zindagi' released online! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Sunday, February 5, 2017 - 16:30 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Well, if you liked Shah Rukh Khan and Alia Bhatt starrer 'Dear Zindagi', then we have a surprise for you. You will be amazed to know that two deleted scenes from the Gauri Shindi directorial were recently released online and they are amazing enough to give you all the feels. 
In the film, SRK can be seen playing life mentor to the 'Kapoor and Sons' diva. The flick is being appreciated by critics and viewers. 
The flick also features Ali Zafar, Kunal Kapoor, Angad Bedi and Aditya Roy Kapur in prominent roles. 
'Dear Zindagi' was produced by Gauri Khan, Karan Johar and Shinde under the banners of Red Chillies Entertainment, Dharma Productions and Hope Productions respectively. It was released on November 25 this year. First Published: Sunday, February 5, 2017 - 16:30 More from zeenews
